title: Marvel Legends Series Avengers Infinity War 6-inch Iron Spider
feature: Collect other Marvel Legends Series figures (each sold separately)
Includes: figure, accessory, and Build-a-Figure part. Ages 4 and up
description: Advanced technology and high-tech gear are signature marks of the web-slinging hero, Spider-Man. With the Marvel Legends Series, both kid and adult Marvel fans can start a legendary collection of comic- and movie-based Marvel characters. This 6-inch Spider-Man figure is highly articulated and features a comic-inspired design, making it another worthy addition to the Marvel Legends Series. Collect all figures in this Avengers Marvel Legends Series Build-a-Figure collection to assemble Thanos! Additional figures sold separately. Subject to availability. Copyright 2017 MARVEL. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
